attributes.action: UK FULL SUPPORT TO ISRAEL IN THE LIGHT OF THE CRISIS IN BOTH SYRIA AND IRAQ
attributes.additional_details: ISRAEL IS A MAJOR UK ALLY.ITS VERY SECURITY & NATIONSTATE IS A VITAL SOURCE OF STABILITY IN AN AREA PRONE TO SEVERE & RAPID INSTABILITY. IN THE LIGHT OF THE VIRTUAL CIVIL WAR IN IRAQ &ACTUAL CIVIL WAR IN SYRIA , WITH THEIR REAL POTENTIAL TO ENGULF OTHER INNOCENT NEIGHBOUR COUNTRIES EG JORDAN WE SHOULD AS A RESPONSIBILE FRIEND REINFORCE ARE LINKS TO THIS MAJOR REGIONAL ALLY,THAT WE, THE UK GOVERNMENT WILL RESPECT AND HELP MAINTAIN ISRAELI BORDERS IN THE HOPE OF PROVIDING A BRAKE TO THE TIDE OF INSTABILITY IN THE MIDDLE EAST.
